shortdesc.ph: Reports the last-mile network quality of the local user once every two seconds before the user joins the channel.

section.p: This callback reports the last-mile network conditions of the local user before the user joins the channel. Last mile refers to the connection between the local device and Agora's edge server.
After the app calls , the SDK triggers this callback once every two seconds. If a channel includes multiple users, the SDK triggers this callback as many times.
